title: Connector Manifest
description: Metadata describing commercial and availability characteristics for a connector

id.description: Connector identifier; must match the folder name

displayName.description: Marketing display name override for the connector

description.description: Long-form marketing description shown in catalogs

pricingTier.description: Commercial tier required to access this connector

deprecated.description: Connector is deprecated and scheduled for removal

hidden.description: Connector should not be listed in public catalogs

featured.description: Connector should be highlighted in marketing surfaces

availabilityOverride.description: Override availability from the connector definition
